author: Staff Reporter
text:
A private bus was set on fire by an irate crowd after it hit two persons riding a two-wheeler at Ariyur near here on Monday.

Shanmugavel (27) of Keezhur and Dakshinamurthy (42) of Kalmandapam were riding a two-wheeler when the private bus bound to Puducherry from Villupuram hit them at Ariyur. The duo sustained serious injuries. As the news of the accident spread an irate mob set the bus ablaze and stoned another bus.
title: Bus set on fire after accident
